alert.note: Alert for Kay (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 10 at 7:32PM CDT until April 10 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Kay County in northern Oklahoma... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 732 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles east of Braman, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Ponca City, Blackwell, Tonkawa, Braman, and Peckham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
